tool.name: Convert .cif file to .cell (cif2cell)
tool.command: pip install cif2cell==2.0.0a3 && ln -s $cif_structure $cif_structure.name && cif2cell -f $cif_structure.name -p castep -o out.cell && sed -i '1,8d' out.cell
tool.help:
usage: cif2cell -f file.cif -p castep -o file.cell
Given an input .cif structure file, convert to equivalent .cell structure file. Uses electronic structure program 'castep'
